title: Communities (Reception Conditions) Regulations 2018 (S.I. No. 230 of 2018).
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Communities
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Communities 

(Reception Conditions) (Amendment) Regulations 2021. 

(2) These Regulations and the Regulations of 2018 shall be construed 
together as one and may be cited together as the European Communities 
(Reception Conditions) Regulations 2018 to 2021.

title: Communities (Reception Conditions) Regulations 2018 (S.I. No. 230 of 2018).
heading: 4. Schedule 3 of the Regulations of 2018 is amended in section 3 of Form
text_raw:
4. Schedule 3 of the Regulations of 2018 is amended in section 3 of Form 
LMA 3 by the substitution of “My application for International Protection is 5 
months old or more (the permission will not become valid until 6 months)” for 
“My application for International Protection is 8 months old or more (the 
permission will not become valid until 9 months)”.
text_norm: 4 schedule 3 regulation 2018 amended section 3 form lma 3 substitution application international protection 5 month old (the permission become valid 6 months) application international protection 8 month old (the permission become valid 9 months)

title: Communities (Reception Conditions) Regulations 2018 (S.I. No. 230 of 2018).
heading: (This is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations amend the labour market access permission provisions of 
the European Communities (Reception Conditions) Regulations (S.I. No. 230 
of 2018), to reduce the timeframe for labour market access from 9 to 6 months, 
and to extend the validity of a labour market permission from 6 to 12 months. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [52] 5
